Student Name: L.C.Mallawaarachchi

I confirm that I understand what plagiarism is and have read and understood the section on Assessment Offences in the Essential Information for Students. The work that I have submitted is entirely my own. Any work from other authors is duly referenced and acknowledged.
*Compare the left expression value with the right expression value.

Game Instructions :- 

*Compare the left expression value with the right expression value.

 *Soon after you click a button it will show whether the answer is correct or wrong.

 *You have 50 seconds of time to interact with the game. After 50 seconds the game will stop automatically.

 *For every correct 5 answers you'll get additional 10 seconds to interact with the game.

 *End of the game you'll get the number of correct answers that you have given.
